attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's get 82 days off for Summer each year, but are paid a full year's salary. With possibly the worst crises Britain has seen in decades upon us (Swine Flu and 'Credit Crunch'), is it fair that MP's forget about all the Country's problems whilst Parliament closes for almost 3 months?  Lets make an MP's salary Pro Rata, and see whether they still want all that holiday??

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
